code:
flowchart LR
    FIAT[Fiat]
    STB[Stablecoins (USDT, USDC, DAI)]
    BTC[BTC / ETH]
    ALTS[Altcoins (TOTAL3 / Others)]
    NOTE[Notes: TOTAL falls when prices drop. Stable dominance can rise without minting. True exit occurs on redemption.]

    FIAT -->|Mint inflow| STB
    STB -->|Redeem outflow| FIAT
    STB -->|Buy spot or margin| BTC
    STB -->|Risk rotation| ALTS
    BTC -->|Sell to stables| STB
    ALTS -->|Sell to stables| STB
    NOTE --- STB
